solution_line_template: First figure out how old Ana is right now by subtracting {years_to_subtract} from {ana_future_age}: {ana_future_age} - {years_to_subtract} = <<{ana_future_age}-{years_to_subtract}={ana_current_age}>>{ana_current_age}
Next, figure out how old Billy is by dividing Ana's age by {divisor_for_billy}: {ana_current_age} / {divisor_for_billy} = <<{ana_current_age}/{divisor_for_billy}={billy_age}>>{billy_age}
Now figure out how old Mark is by adding {mark_age_difference} to Billy's age: {billy_age} + {mark_age_difference} = <<{billy_age}+{mark_age_difference}={mark_age}>>{mark_age}
Now, to figure out Sarah's age, first multiply Mark's age by {sarah_multiplier}: {mark_age} * {sarah_multiplier} = <<{mark_age}*{sarah_multiplier}={triple_mark_age}>>{triple_mark_age}
Finally, subtract {sarah_subtraction} from triple Mark's age to find Sarah's age: {triple_mark_age} - {sarah_subtraction} = <<{triple_mark_age}-{sarah_subtraction}={sarah_age}>>{sarah_age}
